summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; accepting financial assistance from the United States Environmental Protection Agency and the State of Washington Department of Ecology for the Kent Highlands Sanitary Landfill Leachate Interceptor Project, authorizing construction of Phase II of said Project, making an appropriation from the Solid Waste Fund therefor and abandoning certain unexpended and unencumbered funds appropriated in the 1977 Budget of the Engineering Department.
